properties.title: Zurzach thermal baths
properties.abstract: Offering a 2000-mÂ² water landscape and the SPA Medical Wellness Centre, Zurzach thermal baths are the largest and most comprehensive wellness facility in Switzerland.
properties.description:
Immerse yourself in the vitalising waters: relax in the bubbling wellness pool with its many massage jets. Drift with the current in the whirlpool or enjoy the warmth of the relaxation pool.

Breathe freely in the crystal steam room, float around in the intensive salt-water pool and cool off in the natural swimming pool, or alternatively, get your circulation going in the new cold-hot pool. Our smallest guests can enjoy the Papa Moll splash pool and, in the thermal baths restaurant, the Pappa Moll menu.

The sauna landscape offers two so-called 'textile' saunas in which swimming costumes can be worn. The drill rig sauna is based on the history of salt drilling in Bad Zurzach and offers visitors a salt-sauna experience over three floors. A multifaceted selection of massages, steam rooms, foot baths, fitness and nutrition programmes and cosmetic treatments complete the offer.
